vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
χειρόγρᾰφ-ος, ον,
written with the hand, holograph, manuscript, σύμβολον, ἀσφάλ[ε]ια, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]: hence χειρόγρᾰφον, τό, manuscript note, [NT+2nd c.BC+]
__2 note of hand, bond, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; also χειρόγρᾰφος, ὁ, [Refs]
__II paroxytone, χειρογράφος [ᾰ], ὁ, clerk, amanuensis, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
written code, record of debt
handwriting; record of debt; a written form, literal instrument, as distinguished from a spiritual dispensation, Col. 2:14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: documento de deuda, acta con cargos
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (手寫的文件) 記錄, 借據 #西 2:14|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (手写的文件) 记录, 借据 #西 2:14|
